TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItemConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter) 將 物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立執行個體。You should never create an instance of a . 請改為呼叫方法的。Instead, call the method of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個轉換子是否可以使用內容將物件轉換成指定的目的型別。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 `context` 參數來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 這可能是 `null`，所以一定要檢查。This can be `null`, so always check. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.para: 覆寫這個方法，以提供您自己的轉換需求。
Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.

summary.span: 將指定的物件轉換為另一個型別。

span.span: Converts the given object to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常用於轉換的型別為相互轉換字串物件。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 如果物件為有效且目的型別為字串，則預設實作會在物件上呼叫 。The default implementation will make a call to on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string. 如果這個方法無法轉換為目的型別，將會擲回 。If this cannot convert to the destination type, this will throw a .
